column1: What is a group Badge? How can a Badge assigned to my group be useful for it?
column2: Assigning of a Badge to your group can enhance the identity of your group. The associated badge is displayed on your group in an attractive manner along with its title and description. As Badges are used to specifically mark groupes on this community, they can also be used to help users in better identifying the type of groupes they are looking for. From the search form for groupes, users can easily do a quick filtering to see groupes belonging to a particular Badge.

column1: How can I get a Badge for my group?
column2:
Badges are assigned to groupes by our site administrators. Depending on the Package chosen by you for your group, you will be able to request for a particular Badge to be assigned to your group from the “Badge” section in your group Dashboard. Your request for the Badge for your group will be sent to our site administrators. Your group can also be assigned a Badge different from the one requested by you.
Our site administrators can assign a Badge to your group, even if you have not requested for one.

column1: Can I have more than one Badge for my group?
column2: No, only one Badge can be assigned to your group at a time. If your group already has a badge assigned, then you can request for a new Badge and if our site administrators approves it, then your previous Badge will be replaced with the new Badge.
